quick_wins_today.details: Update README and LICENSE: docs = CC-BY 4.0, code = MIT or Apache-2.0
Change --backend to only ['qiskit'] or add explicit 'Not implemented' stubs for classical/molecular
Create examples/classical_filter_positive.hc and reference in README Quick Start
Run tests, generate coverage, add badge even if coverage is low

pr_roadmap.title: Backend choices + registry alignment
tasks: Restrict CLI --backend choices to ['qiskit'] only
OR add ClassicalBackend/MolecularBackend stubs that raise NotImplementedError
Update backend registry to clearly show available vs planned
Add tests for backend selection logic

pr_roadmap.title: Structured error types and ExecutionResult
tasks: Define HyperCodeError base class
Create subclasses: HyperCodeParseError, HyperCodeRuntimeError, HyperCodeBackendError
Add error location info (line, column, file)
Update api.execute to catch specific errors
Update ExecutionResult to carry error type + structured info
Update CLI to display structured errors nicely

pr_roadmap.title: Minimal classical backend implementation
tasks: Implement classical_backend.py with basic interpreter
Support core subset: variables, conditionals, loops, functions
Add 3-5 classical examples (filter, map, factorial, fibonacci)
Add tests for classical backend execution
Update README with classical examples

pr_roadmap.title: IR spec and centralization
tasks: Create docs/source/ir_spec.md documenting IR design
Add docstrings to all qir_nodes classes
Document SSA invariants and type system
Add type checking for IR nodes
Create examples of AST → IR → Backend flow

pr_roadmap.title: README overhaul + repo URL fix
tasks: Implement new README structure (see Bud's outline)
Add Quick Start with install + run example
Add 'Using as a library' section with code example
Add 'For Contributors' section with starter tasks
Fix all repo URLs to THE-HYPERCODE
Add status/maturity table

pr_roadmap.title: CLI tests and --no-color support
tasks: Add tests for 'hypercode parse' command
Add tests for 'hypercode qir' command
Add tests for 'hypercode run' command
Add tests for 'hypercode version' command
Test error paths (file not found, parse errors, unknown backend)
Add --no-color flag
Add TTY detection for color output

pr_roadmap.title: Engine abstraction for CLI/API
tasks: Create hypercode/engine.py module
Implement run_program(code, backend, shots, seed) function
Refactor CLI to use engine
Refactor API to use engine
Add tests for engine module

pr_roadmap.title: Quantum resource limits
tasks: Create hypercode/config.py with limit constants
Add MAX_QUBITS, MAX_DEPTH, MAX_SHOTS config
Enforce limits in Evaluator
Enforce limits in QiskitBackend
Add env var support for config overrides
Add tests for resource limit enforcement

pr_roadmap.title: Coverage reporting + badge
tasks: Configure pytest to output coverage.xml
Create GitHub Actions workflow for tests
Upload coverage to Codecov or similar
Add coverage badge to README
Set coverage target (e.g., >70%)

pr_roadmap.title: Sphinx docs site
tasks: Organize docs into User Guide / Language Reference / Compiler Internals / Research
Create index.rst with clear navigation
Build docs site with Sphinx
Add 'Getting Started' guide
Add 'Language Reference' section
Deploy to ReadTheDocs or GitHub Pages

additional_critical_tasks.details: Create requirements-dev.txt with locked versions for CI; run pip-audit periodically
Audit Evaluator and backends to ensure no string-based code execution; add security tests
Create contributor guide with setup, code style, PR process, good first issues
Document SemVer policy and breaking-change process
